label: Also in comparision with Swiss the great power in the pharmaceit industry, the Israeli medicin industry can be proud with its products - said Eli Horowitz General Manager of TEVA, in a conference orgnised by Dr. Dov Czernichowski, head of the Managing and Health Economy faculty at Ben Gurion University in Beer Sheba.
